title: Chomsky with Rhiz Khan  2007.06.25 reseed (Al-Jazeera) avi
description:
Chomsky with Rhiz Khan  2007.06.25 reseed (Al-Jazeera) avi  

16.45 mins
75 megs
 xvid

Pretty well vintage Chomsky in discussing 911, the ?war on terror? and the sham motives of American aggression in Iraq with comments on the failure of American democratic institutions to reflect the will of the majority on many public issues.  Deflects a Zionist Jewish critic and declines an invitation to embrace Islam. 

(Although touted as the world?s greatest intellectual, some are looking for an explanation of his thesis that South Korea invaded North Korea in 1950 and the Killing Fields of Cambodia are a myth invented by the New York Times?)

shunster
